name: Workplace Rhapsody
description:
Just graduated from college ready to enter the workplace of the new man, after many competitions, successfully entered a senior underwear design listed company, become the company's only male employees. How to get along with people in the company has become his biggest problem. How will he deal with the ordeal and win the hearts of all the women in his company?

Gameplay:

The player plays the role of a new employee who enters the company and obtains information about colleagues through dialogue with them. Tailor your gifts to the needs of your colleagues for maximum effect. The next day will refresh each character's favorability degree, if the favorability degree is 0, then need to fight with colleagues, battle victory can obtain higher favorability degree. Players also need to balance their attributes between work and rest, manage their time well, earn enough money, and buy items to get a girl.

The game contains systems:
1, the backpack
2, shops
3, dialogue
5, a gift
6, work
7, and rest,
8, fight,
